column1: #text=I decided to try baking a cake for the first time .
#text=Even though I was n't too sure about how to do it , I figured I would have fun trying .
#text=I looked up the recipe online and went to the store to buy all the ingredients .
#text=I set everything on the kitchen counter and went to work .
#text=I first opened all the packages of the ingredients .
#text=I then followed the recipe in full detail to make sure I did it correctly .
#text=As soon as I had everything properly mixed , I pre-heated the oven and made sure it was at the right temperature .
#text=When the timer indicated the oven was ready , I put the cake tray with the mixed cake batter inside .
#text=I waited for forty minutes until it was ready .
#text=I took out the cake and put chocolate frosting on top .
#text=The cake came out pretty well for my first time baking .
